title: ON AIR
subtitle: Tangible music
body: A music platform where user own individual tracks, tracks are 'printed' in a limited quantity on various formats such as Compact cassette or Minidisc, each track is assigned an non-fungible token (NFT) to ensure it's authenticity. The quality of the audio may depend on the chosen format. Tracks can be used to create mixtapes, these can be lent/gifted to other users, or even exported to their corresponding physical format in which case the Mixtape becomes unavailable in the app.
